🐧 Spacious Entertainment Space - The Bottom Layer Can be Used as a Playard, available from baby to toddles (0-3 years old). Provide the closer space for mother-infant interaction
🐧 Handy Diaper Changer - Diaper Stacker help you change diapers and feeding no longer backache, you can fetch the diaper or the milk bottle from the side organizer for the temporarily need
🐧 Rhythmic Mobile with 3 Soft Toy - 3 soft dolls and cheerful songs can sooth your little one more to keep a peaceful mood and inspire children to play and learn

🐧 Good Choice to Vist Grandparents - Light structure for easy take in the journey, we send the travel bag coming with the package. You can set up and fold by only 4 simple steps. Please Make Sure lock the fence before push down the bottom base to keep sturdy

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Greatest Quality for Dearest One Thicker Bed Frame Anodized treatment, wear-resistant and corrosion-resistant, long service life. Soft and Smooth Made from Oxford cloth, sunlight durable and anti-abrasive, not easy to break, stable without elastic Breathable Mesh Sides It has excellent breathability and visible that can pay attention to the baby's situation at any time Features Summary large size Skin-friendly material Four-level height Lightweight for easy carry Tool-free installation Compliance with ASTM Double-layer design for babies of different ages

Swivel Mobile without batteries Music box makes baby fall asleep quicker (Battery does not included) and whirling provides babies more fun Handy diaper stacker To avoid sore waist caused by long-term bending, the easy-clean changer provides a place for quick diaper changes,and it can be detached to wash. Bottom Layer Playard Available 0-6 years old.Utopia for mother-infant interaction.

Cleaning & Maintenance 1. All plastic parts may be cleaned using wet, soft cloth. Do not use any aggressive cleaning agents 2. Metal parts shall only be cleaned using dry cloth. 3. Both the upholstery parts and the mattress may be cleaned using wet, soft cloth using mild washing agents. Do not use any aqgres-sive cleaning agents. Do not whirl and tumble dry!

Reinforcement Safety Be sure to always use the included straps to anchor sleeper to adult bed. Stable Support Structure The cross-over design of iron pipes at the bottom is more stable and strong, and the actual load-bearing capacity is 77lbs. Elegant Jacquard The surface texture design is more fashionable, with sponge filling, anti-collision and wear-resistant Perfect for Travel It is light and foldable that easy to be took-down for easy transportation and storage,a free travel bag coming with the package.

Installation Steps Unfold the playard Take out the folded playard in the bag. Lock the 2 short fences Lift up 2 short side fences. (DON‘T push the bottom down yet) Lock the 2 long fences Lift up 2 long side fences. (DON‘T push the bottom down yet) Push down the bottom After making sure the fences are locked, push down the central bottom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for my grand child and the parents loved it! Was easy to assemble and very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good crib
reviews.reviewText: It is light weight which makes it easy to move around the house. Like the design. Only thing that was difficult was the set up. Instruction is not that clear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice can go from a bassinet to a playpen. You can also use it as a bed but you would have to reach way down and put the baby in but if it makes a very good play in after the baby gets old enough and you can also take it with you on trip or to grandma’s house or to families house very good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Some people need to read the instructions again, and others need to restart.
reviews.reviewText: Watching some of these review videos had me cackling. First of all, read the instructions when you’re setting something up. Center red part stays up, click short sides first, then long sides, then push down the center. Just like your phone or computer, if it stops engaging a lock on one of the sides, turn off and restart. You can’t relock a short side with all the other sides locked. You have to START OVER.Secondly, yes the side dips, that’s what the side clips are for. You attach them to the rail so it doesn’t dip. Lordy.I do have some complaints though, the changing pad/table attaches to the same side the storage attachment does so you can’t use both at the same time. Also, the changing pad/table can’t stay on if you have the bedside side down. I don’t have a solution for the latter.I love this thing, it’s awesome and worth the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Buy . Caddy is not Sturdy. Flexible sides are very useful.
reviews.reviewText: I mainly bought this for the retractable sides which have been useful thus far. The mattress that it comes with is very hard, I had to purchase a mattress separately for my baby to be more comfortable. And the mattress to fit it is very hard to find. The caddy is very easily removed as the clips do not hold it on firmly enough. The changing station is a bit flimsy but I like that it dries easily when wet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The most dangerous baby product I’ve ever seen.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I purchased this for my 4 month old son. I wanted to put it beside my bed like the ad pictures. Now I’ll start from the beginning. I got it very prompt as Amazon always is. I was able to assemble it quickly and without any issues. The crib/bassinet was much lower than my bed. I know beds are different heights but it still looks as if the ad pictures are a bit deceiving. I put a small quilt over the hard “mattress” which really just feels like cardboard with a little cushion. He has been sleeping in a dockatot but I know he will likely start rolling over soon so I was wanting to transition him to something different. I laid him in the middle of the bassinet at 9:30 asleep and in his sleep sack. He normally sleeps all night so when he started shifting around midnight I knew he wasn’t comfortable. I watched him stretch and move a little but he was satisfied with a paci for a few minutes. He started moving around again and when I looked down he was face down in the mesh panel and the mattress part was tilted completely from his weight. He was completely wedged and was able to move. To say I was terrified is an understatement. I’ve worked as an EMT and RN for 15 years. I’ve seen children die unnecessarily for all types of reasons so I feel like I’m slightly more in tune with products that are safe. Let me just say. I completely missed the mark with this one. I have never been more scared in my life. Not only am I reviewing and returning this product, but I am also going to email Amazon and request they remove this item from their services. I have never done anything like that but it is completely unsafe. My son has multiple abrasions to his head as well but he is alive and healthy. I’m attaching a pictures and videos as well so hopefully others will heed my warning. After this incident last night , I did see someone else’s review that included a video and it’s completely accurate. I only wish I had seen that video sooner. Please please do NOT put your children at risk with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: I’m in love. it was exactly what I was looking for. It will last a very long time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No regrets in buying this bassinet. My only grip about it is the way the toy latches on. For safety reasons I might eventually be taking it down.

reviews.reviewerName: Bastantes lindos vienen Justo como la imagen,los amé excelente calidad

reviews.reviewText: Tenía muchas dudas al querer hacer la compra , por qué hay muchas opiniones diferentes de los compradores, pero sin lugar a duda no nos equivocamos con la compra, lo único que por sus medidas estoy batallando mucho para encontrarle un colchoncito pero eso es otra cosa, el producto cumple lo que dice
